subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Tajh Boyd threw for a school-record 428 yards with five touchdown passes, Sammy Watkins added a school-record 202 yards receiving, and No. 14 Clemson routed host Wake Forest, 42-13.
snippet: Tajh Boyd threw for a school-record 428 yards with five touchdown passes, Sammy Watkins added a school-record 202 yards receiving, and No. 14 Clemson routed host Wake Forest, 42-13.
